Reviews.Title: “nice, interesting place to stay for solo/ business travellers...”
Reviews.Author: SoumitreeG
Reviews.Content: stay tecom hence booked basis past reviews disappointed seriously consider coming plus 1 prebooked wasnt available upgraded suite huge nice fittings excellent bathroom 2 book breakfast buffet worth 3 nice swimming pool massage 4 24x7 service 5 english pub hve pretty waitresses ncie liquor 6 inhouse nightclub noisy affair brought amount color 7 overall atmosphere hotel pretty fun colorful easy cabs times day minus 1 pls include internet rates looks ridiculous sell internet hrs separately free kinds 2 minibar empty checkedin remind fill 3 billing takes morning checkout errors bill internet paid cash added bill prebook thru net currency booked currency displayed aed price overall yes

Reviews.Title: “Going back”
Reviews.Author: RForbesRobertson
Reviews.Content: recently dubai hotel suggested convenience price scored standard huge buffet breakfast included stupid charges internet resent sort rip thats english pub attractive waitresses wearing tight shirts burberry beer noisy evening girl singer saxophonist astoundingly ill beer singer

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Luxury Hotel”
Reviews.Author: UllasgShah
Reviews.Content: spacious newly constructed booked hotel reviews reviewers bit disappointedwe loved hotelthe staff helpfulthe cleanwe loved location dubai near metro station easy everythingwe enjoyed complimentary breakfast definitely stay dubai

Reviews.Title: “nightclub noise”
Reviews.Author: latte225
Reviews.Content: recently stayed byblos business close office night manager lovely friendly noise level else hotel nightclub penthouse spent night trying sleep 1am couldnt due thump thump thump music 11th floor nightclub 3am moved night 3rd floor hear thump thump thump albeit loud sounds airconditioning unit door hear noise blast breakfasts fine bed clean staff lovely dont stay holiday

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in an ideal business location”
Reviews.Author: olsontowers
Reviews.Content: stayed byblos foyer refurbished time little impact ideal furnished comfortable beds issue meeting booked double booked couple days staff contact eager please restaurant breakfast id recommend hotel quality vs price id bang dont expect 5 4 operation easy access sheikh zayed rd dubai quickly concierge hail cab times day night

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic stay at the Hotel !!”
Reviews.Author: Nipun_11
Reviews.Content: comment excellent service offered stay hotel comfortable bfast nice manager – markets central reservations office elite hospitality kingdom bahrain tel fax mobile email web

Reviews.Title: “Had to write this to inform the unaware........”
Reviews.Author: domb1976
Reviews.Content: byblos marketed business class hotel impression disorganised front desk comical except paying guest realised error chinese resident trying poor english receptionist couldnt bothered try understand practically ignored whilst else own checkin person russian cold matter russia decor appropriate hotel class noticed id smoking stank stale cigarettes spoke russian receptionist change informed 2 designated smoking floors hotel hotel 16 floors guess ratio smoker impression russian girl saying start begrudgingly offerred send housekeeping spray air promptly nice kid weapons grade spray throat guess windows dont constant banging drilling nearby annoying connecting internet nightmare russian girl told sternly warned hourly charge fine alas didnt enter promptly didnt russian girl send 24hr internet voucher warned cost fine 30 mins decided front desk sign crappy internet voucher getting mention civil engineering ongoing door russian girl replied oh ok finished 1800 shift passport passport required scanned arrival disorganised checked return im waiting write review booking breakfast included else ive stayed upgraded comped positives clean apart stale cigarette smoke

Reviews.Title: “Too Far from Every Where”
Reviews.Author: Mohsen26
Reviews.Content: stayed byblos hotel 6 nights nov 2010 check friendly speedy service designed air condition lightings internet connection expensive disappointing traditional english bar boring walk 10 min dusty metro station taxis doesnt byblos hotel notice tecom pay lot money taxi hotel view bad construction buildings pool fake tank 2m 5m max depth 1m break fast ok egg fruits sausage cereals cookies milk fruit juice

Reviews.Title: “Pretty good, but the pub - oh dear”
Reviews.Author: laidbackcyclist
Reviews.Content: appointed modern hotel standard bathroom mild complaint water temperature shower nice touches electronic control panel ate italian average quality expensive service value flavour delivered quickly breakfast cafe 1st floor pretty gym floor trainer attached club spends time watching tv putting traditional british pub ghastly smoky noisy brash clientele avoid plague head indooroutdoor bar 1st floor charging internet access valid 24hours annoys free night hotel december staff santa hats christmas decorations id didnt bother arabic country

Reviews.Title: “Well maintained Average Service”
Reviews.Author: Vivek_Singh
Reviews.Content: 10 minute walk dubai metro station hotel managed neat kept stayed executive days spacious views expect 23 kinds body lotion plastic bottles ear buds shampoo towels hot water supply closet shoe horn sponge kept shine shoes wish breakfast lovely selection fruits dry fruits cereals eggs expect pay money arrival else deposit passport call 5 times iron arrived housekeeping guy nice fixed flat sheet ironing board ready pay 15 dirhams hour internet stay

Reviews.Title: “Modern and very well appointed hotel but bad food”
Reviews.Author: DerbysTraveller
Reviews.Content: stayed byblos hotel nights late june 2010 hotel located dubai location taxi based access attractions mall emirates ski dubai marina madinat jumeirah wild wadi atlantis etc tecom greens quiet immediate amenities short taxi journey greens centre selection restaurants pharmacy etc hotel offers free valet parking friendly speedy check hotel modern comfortable modern electronic touches touch button disturb facility etc easy access speed wireless internet charged hour excellent 5 4 minor issue sound water running shower heard walls issue unless neighbour likes shower 2am massage spa restaurant english pub bar site following unsavoury gained eating service meal im id recommend sampling food dubai amazing food opportunities hotel stay eat elsewhere advice

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: Josau
Reviews.Content: hotel walking distance internet city metro station staff helpful friendly designed clean pool decent size hardly people al hotel located hippest neighbourhood construction didnt disturb impression stay hotel suited business travelers leisure

Reviews.Title: “Good value”

Reviews.Content: slightly difficult locate al barsha district greens hotel comfortable spacious lively coffee shop outdoors busy pub constitute main entertainment staff helpful overall value money faily near mall emirates jumeirah proximity sheikh zayed road makes travel dubai accessible
